experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
accomplishments: - Major contributor to Venture Home,  the main landing surface for existing customers.
- Optimized server-side rendering processes for Venture Home creating a ~77% reduction in server response time for power users.
- Led a project to unify app navigation across all “Website and Marketing” product pages, coordinating efforts across multiple teams and codebases.
- Contributor and maintainer for a shared-components Lerna mono-repo.
- Contributor to multiple internal tools including admin tools for account references and a chrome extension for traffic event observation.

experience.title: Front End Developer
accomplishments: - Sole front end developer for role-based enterprise level tools for use by Foster care caseworkers.
- Utilize React, Docker, AWS and Figma for frontend design, development and deployment.
- Developed AWS Lambda function for image compression and synchronous fetching solution to reduce client load times by up to 70%.
- Ensure the app is secure and adheres to HIPAA compliance by implementing best practices such as Casbin RBAC and authorization tokens to protect routes, API endpoints and AWS file transfers.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer / Co-Host
accomplishments: - Worked on the Jobs for Hope Project for the LA County Homeless Initiative utilizing React, Node / Express, CSS / SASS, and PostgreSQL. Contributions to responsive design elements, SQL schemas, routes and registration logic.
- Contributions to login/registration logic and input validations using JSON Web Tokens and B-Crypt, and MS SQL Server schema and functions for the TDM project for LADOT.
- Contributions to search algorithm logic, SQL query functions and data scraping for Food Oasis LA project.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
accomplishments: - Utilized React for the front end and Node/Express and PostgreSQL for the backend.
- Responsible for implementing Redis for session store and global state (Redux) for user information.
- Developed Postgres queries and database schemas and consumable RESTful endpoints for utilization. Created API endpoint documentations.
- Designed unit tests using Jest/Enzyme and endpoint test suites using Postman Collection Runner.
